arts.ttl: Lyon vs PSG – The OL squad: 5 players out
arts.sum: This Sunday, Paris Saint-Germain (1st) and Olympique Lyonnais (6th) will face off at the Parc des Princes in Matchday 12 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season (kick-off at 8:45 pm, CET). Here is the squad selected by Lyon coach Paulo Fonseca for this match. Unavailable: Abner, Hateboer (suspension), Fofana, Mangala, Nuamah (injury).

arts.ttl: PSG XI vs Lyon – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: PSG are set to visit the Groupama Stadium to take on Olympique Lyonnais. Both teams are hungry for a result, with PSG aiming to consolidate their lead at the top of the table while Lyon seek to push upwards after recently drawing a couple of matches.
